resources.title: Dimensions
resources.description: Dimensions.com is an ongoing reference database of dimensioned drawings documenting the standard measurements and sizes of the everyday objects and spaces that make up our world

resources.title: PhysicallyBased Materials
resources.description: A database of physically based values for CG artists

resources.title: Blender
resources.description: Blender is a free and open-source 3D creation suite that supports the entire 3D pipeline

resources.title: Meshlab
resources.description: The open source system for processing and editing 3D triangular meshes. It provides a set of tools for editing, cleaning, healing, inspecting, rendering, texturing and converting meshes

resources.title: Amazon Lumberyard Bistro
resources.description: Realtime environment created for GDC 2017 Amazon showcase

resources.title: Classic Sponza - Unity Remaster
resources.description: Unity remaster of the classic Sponza scene
